name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish made with creamy egg sauce, pancetta, and parmesan.
instructions: Boil pasta. Fry pancetta until crispy. Whisk eggs and parmesan. Combine pasta with pancetta, then stir in egg mixture off heat to create a creamy sauce.

name: Chicken Curry
description: A flavorful Indian chicken curry simmered in aromatic spices and creamy sauce.
instructions: Saut√© onions, garlic, ginger. Add spices and tomatoes. Stir in chicken and cook. Pour coconut milk and simmer until chicken is tender.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Crunchy tacos filled with seasoned beef, fresh veggies, and melted cheese.
instructions: Cook beef with onions and spices. Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese. Serve with salsa or guacamole.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: Quick and healthy stir-fry packed with colorful vegetables and soy sauce glaze.
instructions: Heat oil in a wok. Add garlic and ginger. Toss in chopped vegetables. Stir-fry quickly, then add soy sauce. Serve hot with rice.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Italian pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: Roll out pizza dough. Spread tomato sauce. Add mozzarella and basil leaves. Bake in hot oven until crust is golden and cheese is bubbling.

name: Greek Salad
description: Fresh and vibrant salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese.
instructions: Chop cucumber, tomatoes, and onions. Mix in olives and feta. Drizzle with olive oil and season with oregano and salt.

name: Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes perfect for breakfast, served with syrup or fruits.
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, milk, and eggs. Fry spoonfuls in butter until golden on both sides. Serve with syrup or fruit.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan.
instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing. Add croutons and parmesan. Serve chilled.

name: Sushi Rolls
description: Traditional Japanese rice rolls with nori, vegetables, and seafood.
instructions: Spread rice on nori. Add cucumber, avocado, and salmon. Roll tightly and slice into pieces. Serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Rich and moist chocolate cake topped with creamy frosting.
instructions: Mix flour, cocoa, sugar, and baking powder. Stir in eggs and butter. Bake until a toothpick comes out clean. Frost with chocolate icing.
